subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] sounds like,

Science people will tell you there is no astral. The term "Astral" was coin=
ed by the first people who experienced this realm. But all words were coine=
d. Even words such as dog or cat. 

Also, subconscious means below consciou=
s or not conscious. So it isn't incorrect, though maybe some scholarly type=
s will tell you it isn't proper. Again, all words were coined.

You have to=
 remember that colleges and schools are mostly made up by people, people wh=
o think only scientifically. I know-not all people in colleges think this w=
ay, but that is what learning institutions are based on. They reject any te=
rm they can't grasp or understand under a microscope.

All this is besides =
the point though.


  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: SnowfireL@aol.c=
om 
  To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Wednesday, May 20, 2009 9:05 AM
=
  Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] sounds like,






  The word is really unconsciou=
s, the word sub. was coined by lay people, but any psychologist will tell u=
s the word to use is unconscious because it is the correct term, Psych's ma=
ke a joke about us  lay people using the word subconscious to mean the same=
 thing,  I had 12 credits toward my PhD but, til ran out of money.  I under=
stand what you are saying though, the word "astral" is also a made up word,=
 as is many of the new terms out there like "ascended master" and "channel"=
 I think they refer to guide and medium, respectively.sf

  In a message da=
ted 5/20/2009 10:54:36 A.M. Eastern Daylight Time, april@abercrombieghostre=
search.com writes:
    subconscious
